page.title: 07WOODWORKER
page.content:
Simon Denton-Woodworker.
Mr.Denton was a Wood Work teacher and now has worked for 2 years as a carpenter in his own business.He enjoyes his work very much.His favourite bit of Furniture is a Welsh Dresser.It takes 14 hours to make a table.Mr.Denton gets all his wood from old houses and churches.He makes Furniture and toys for his family and he has made 2 chests of draws.Mr.Denton has made an organ stool and a few things for mr.Davis.He has made akitchen unit and some chairs and he works alone and his customers are local people.
